definition: Aimin district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
Aimin district of Mudanjiang city 牡丹江市, Heilongjiang

sentences.english: Aimin Tang is director of the China Scientific Development Research Center.
sentences.chinese: 唐爱民，中国科学发展研究中心主任。

sentences.english: I am worried about people's life and the state affairs all day.
sentences.chinese: 我勤政爱民，整天为国事，为百姓的生活担心忧虑。

sentences.english: Love the people, strict in request the oneself, serve society, create the brilliancy together.
sentences.chinese: 爱民，严于律己，服务社会，共创辉煌。

sentences.english: During the Spring Festival, activities of supporting the government and cherishing the people were in full swing.
sentences.chinese: 春节期间拥政爱民的活动搞得热火朝天。

sentences.english: Buyer Mu Aimin's family runs a pharmacy in the city of Shahe.
sentences.chinese: 穆爱民家在沙河市经营一家药铺。

sentences.english: This is the way to love the people.
Jiang Gaoming and Tang Aimin investigate the shady underbelly of China's poultry industry.
sentences.chinese: 蒋高明与唐爱民调查了中国家禽业不为人知的故事。

definition: Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
